text: The Tuxedo is a 2002 American science fiction action comedy movie. It was directed by Kevin Donovan. The movie is about a special tuxedo that gives its wearer special abilities. It received negative reviews from critics. == References == Category:2002 comedy movies Category:2002 action movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies about technology
title: The Tuxedo
